      • withMaxAge

        public Http.CookieBuilder withMaxAge(java.time.Duration maxAge)
        Set the maximum age of the cookie.

        For example, to set a maxAge of 40 days: builder.withMaxAge(Duration.of(40, ChronoUnit.DAYS))

        Parameters:
        maxAge - a duration representing the maximum age of the cookie. Will be truncated to the nearest second.
        Returns:
        the cookie builder with the new maxAge
